cause.description:
There are hundreds of Aliens that look at our planet with fear in their eye. Nowhere in the universe can you find a more brutal planet where the master race uses brute force against each other.
Thanks to your donations we will be able to provide guides and safe passage here on earth. The aliens come here with new technology that often are granted in return for a succesfull vacation
1. Aliens must feel safe on earth
2. We need free alien technology
3. Please support our organisation
cause.name: Help friendly UFO´s
